DOC.brief_summary: This study plan describe utilization pattern oral anticoagulant time patient non-valvular atrial fibrillation risk stroke use electronic claim data United States commercial insurance database .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : A recorded diagnosis atrial fibrillation Initiation oral anticoagulant medication CHA2DS2VAScScore > =1 At least 18 year age date anticoagulant initiation Exclusion criterion : Patients miss ambiguous age sex information Patients document evidence valvular disease Patients le 12 month enrolment UnitedHealth Research Database precede first dispensing Patients prior use oral anticoagulant
